name: The Journal
description:
Your soul is trapped in a never ending loop in some form of purgatory. Use your strength, cunning and wits to find the exit! You will fall, but threat not, you will retain some memory of the things you lost, as death is not the end, nor is it a beggining, it simply....Is.

Paula Navarro: programmer and designer.

Julio Fernandez: programmer and designer.

Sergio Cabanillas: artist and illustrator.

Josep Mira: musician and composer.
